overview: For more than 15 years Korn have been on the cutting edge of alternative music, after having almost single-handedly developed a new form of the genre back in the mid-1990s. This documentary film tells the Korn story from a number of non-traditional angles. The fans, the crew and the band's close associates all have their say as archive footage sets the scene and exclusive interviews embellish the narrative.
title: Korn: Pandemonium
